alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:20PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 220 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles east of Wendover to 23 miles west of Utah Test and Training Range South. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range North, Utah Test and Training Range South and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 9 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
